  • Get
    Involved

    Work with us for a change

    The change you always wanted.

      Be a volunteer

      Sign u p as a volunteer and help us run fundraiser campaigns, conduct workshops etc. This is an opportunity for you to work for the community.

      Find out more

      Start a fundraiser

      If you're a student, you can start fundraising in our platform for your cause. We'll help you to raise money through our Sākār Spark program.

      Find out more

      Partner with us

      If you are an educational institution, you can partner with us and provide an opportunity to your students start campaigns for their cause.

      Find out more

      Donate

      You can donate us directly or to individual projects. Either way, your donations help us reach those who're in need across the globe.

      Find out more

    Us

About Us

At Sākār Foundation, we believe, we can solve problems only by solving the root cause. We encourage children to actively involve in activities for betterment of the society. We also make them learn Not only humans but even all living beings including animals and plants are the part of Nature's fabric as we call it.

Who we are
